```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(DBI)
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
dbWriteTable(con, "mtcars", mtcars)
```

```{prql}
from mtcars | filter cyl > 6 | select [mpg] | take 3
```

```{prql}
#| engine-opts:
#|   dialect: mssql
#|   signature_comment: false

from mtcars | filter cyl > 6 | select [mpg] | take 3
```

```{prql engine.opts=list(dialect="mssql", signature_comment=FALSE)}
from mtcars | filter cyl > 6 | select [mpg] | take 3
```

```{prql}
#| connection: con

from mtcars | filter cyl > 6 | select [mpg] | take 3
```

```{prql}
from mtcars
filter cyl > 6
select [cyl, mpg]
derive [mpg_int = round 0 mpg]
take 3
```

```{prql, connection=con}
from mtcars
filter cyl > 6
select [cyl, mpg]
derive [mpg_int = round 0 mpg]
take 3
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
dbDisconnect(con)
```
